melting.patternModels.cricksPair
Class GlobalInitiation

java.lang.Object
  melting.patternModels.PatternComputation
      melting.patternModels.cricksPair.CricksNNMethod

All Implemented Interfaces:
PatternComputationMethod
Direct Known Subclasses:
Breslauer86, Santalucia96
public abstract class GlobalInitiation
extends CricksNNMethod

This class represents one model to compute the initiation enthalpy and entropy. The duplex initiation is computed by the addition of either an initiation penalty for duplexes containing at least one GC base pair or an initiation penalty for duplexes only composed of AT or AU base pairs. It extends CricksNNMethod.
